components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Claro Network in Colombia From  a Subset of Short Codes

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Claro network in Colombia from a subset of Short codes. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Claro Network in Colombia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays (original notification incorrectly noted failures) when sending messages to Claro Network. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are investigating MMS/SMS delivery failures sending to Claro Network in Colombia. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We expect to provide another update in 30 minutes or as soon as more information becomes available.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Global Account Security Carrier Partner Maintenance - Three UK

incident_updates.body:
Our Global Carrier Partner Three UK is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 08:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 23:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent API request failures for the following destinations: Austria, Indonesia, Italy, UK
Impacted Products - Carrier

Silent Network Authentication (SNA) - 3 Indonesia, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Lookup SIM Swap - 3 Austria, Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK
Identity Match - Wind (Tre) Italy, Three UK

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - Verify Silent Network Auth

scheduled_maintenances.name: Indonesia SMS carrier maintenance - 3 (PT Hutchison CP Telecommunications)

incident_updates.body: The 3 (PT Hutchison CP Telecommunications) network in Indonesia is conducting an emergency maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 09:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 10:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Hutchison Indonesia handsets using domestic Sender IDs.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a planned maintenance from 03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to and from Tele2 Russia handsets

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 03 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
05 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 05 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
10 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 10 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT

19 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 19 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
24 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 24 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT
26 April 2023 at 13:00 PDT until 26 April 2023 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Deactivation of status.twilio.com component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'

incident_updates.body:
Dear Twilio customer,

You’re receiving this notification because you’ve been identified as a status.twilio.com user who is subscribed to the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' under the section 'External Connectivity' and 'Carrier Network'.

Please note that Twilio will be deactivating the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks' by April 10, 2023.

Any future incident or maintenance communication regarding SMS delivery notifications and status callbacks will be shared service specific via the following carrier network components:
• SMS, APAC
• SMS, Europe
• SMS, Middle East & Africa
• SMS, Latin America
• SMS Toll Free, North America
• SMS Long Code, North America
• SMS Short Code, North America

Please visit https://status.twilio.com and update your preferred notification components via the 'Subscribe To Updates' link located in the top right corner. No action is required to proactively unsubscribe from the component 'SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks'.

Please reach out to Twilio Support if you have any questions.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS Delivery Notifications & Status Callbacks
